heroblade.release_notes:
Release v3.0.1.34715 (LTS)
========================================
HSE2 (HeroScript Editor 2) Updates
========================================

UI/UX Improvements:
- Complete UI/UX overhaul to match reference project appearance
- Script tabs now wrap/stack vertically instead of horizontal scrolling when multiple scripts are open
- History panel now opens automatically on HSE2 startup
- Panel grouping: Script Console and other panels appear side-by-side as tabs
- Removed yellow background from Script Console (changed to light blue to match reference)
- Windows menu completely redesigned to match reference project with all functional features

Menu & Toolbar Enhancements:
- Added "Script Console" function to Tools menu
- Added "All modified scripts compile" function to Tools and Windows menus
- Added "Compile all modified files" button with icon to toolbar
- Added CTRL + H shortcut for "Diff and History" menu
- Added Ctrl + Shift + F functionality
- Added "Always on Top" option to Windows menu (keeps HSE2 window on top of all other windows when enabled)

Version Control Features:
- Implemented "Diff Revisions" functionality using P4 Merge
- Implemented "Diff Vs Client" functionality
- Added "View" button in History panel that downloads/opens .txt file in Temp folder and deletes on close
- History items are now clickable and support multi-selection (Ctrl key)
- "Diff Revisions" button appears when two or more history items are selected
- History panel UI updated: removed grid lines, exact 1:1 match with reference project
- Added "Open Counterpart" button in History panel: automatically opens the client script when viewing a server script, or opens the server script when viewing a client script
- History panel buttons arranged side-by-side in a single row

Compilation & Submission:
- Task List now only opens automatically when there are compile errors (not on every F7 press)
- Compile/Submit success notification UI updated
- Submit messages (CTRL+F7) now display in bold text
- Compile messages (F7) display in regular text
- Real-time syntax checking: Automatic compilation when text changes (500ms debounce delay)
- Errors are detected immediately as you type (no need to press F7)
- Fixed errors are automatically removed from Task List in real-time
- Task List automatically closes when all errors are fixed
- Success message with green checkmark icon displayed when compilation succeeds: "Pre-compilation successful of [ScriptName]"
- Real-time checking works even after submit (CTRL+F7) - continues to detect errors automatically

Task List Improvements:
- Task List UI updated to match reference project 100% (1:1)
- Added "Current HeroScript Only" checkbox for filtering errors by current script
- Column headers updated: "?" (Type), "Script", "Line", "Column", "Description"
- Task List automatically closes when all errors are cleared
- Errors are removed from Task List in real-time when fixed in editor
- Task List buttons arranged side-by-side in a single row

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed application crash on startup
- Fixed crash when closing Blade while Script Editor and LaniBlade are both open (NullReferenceException in HSForm_FormClosing)
- Fixed missing resource references and compiler errors
- Fixed Task List visibility logic to respect error state
- Fixed Task List not closing automatically when all errors are resolved
- Fixed real-time error checking not working after submit (CTRL+F7)

UI/UX Improvements (LaniBlade):
========================================
- Tab menus now wrap vertically (multiline) instead of extending horizontally - tabs stack in multiple rows when space is limited
- Area Organization tree view: Added icons for individual areas (mountain/terrain icon) and different icons for folders
- Console output: Added padding at bottom of console output area to ensure last line is always readable with space below it
- Console timestamp format: Changed from time-only (HH:mm:ss) to full date and time format (yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss) for better log tracking
